name: Literature Digest
description: Generate digests and extract references from academic papers (Markdown).

prompts.gemini:
Please call the skill named "{{ skill.id }}".

Please ingest the markdown file at `{{ input.md_path }}`.
Then generate a literature digest in `{{ parameter.language }}` following the SKILL.md protocol.

Output the final JSON object to stdout logic as defined in SKILL.md.

Input Context:
- md_path: {{ input.md_path }}
- language: {{ parameter.language }}
